title: [GAMEPLAY] Random Movement speed slow glitch
body:
Sooo every since I have installed the new client (Open Beta), I have been experiencing completely random drops in my played champions movement speed. 
It seems I lose ~60% movespeed for a few seconds constantly throughout a match....
It is actually frustrating and constantly makes me ruin my combos and playstyle....

Is this a known bug? 
Or any known fixes?

replies.body: This sounds like lag. i doubt it has anything to do with the client, since the client is not part of the actual gameplay.
